posts.post_content:
Hi all, I am selling a 175 card raw lot. I would only consider selling the entire lot to one buyer. A few key details:
  
- 175 total cards (all raw)
- 8 HOF cards 
- 5 cards are duplicated (all commons) 
- A mix of Piedmont, Sweet Cap, Polar Bear and 1 EPDG (a HOF card - Bresnahan)
- While raw, the condition of the cards are quite nice. None of the cards are terrible. 
- 7 of 8 HOF cards are very nice, 1 has a small crease
- I have scans of all the cards and an excel checklist I can share.

Serious inquiries please email [url]ariskarras13@gmail.com[/url]

Email sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I have sent an email.  Also, if you have previously done business with folks on the board or have other hobby references that would be good to know for a deal of this size.  

Warm regards
Scott

Hi everyone, I apologize if I haven't responded to you yet but trying to get to everyone. 

Note I have 2 offers so if I responded to you already can you let me know if you are interested (or not). It would be helpful to smooth out the process. thanks,

AK
SOLD - thanks to everyone for their interest
